txt_en: Love is like quicksilver in the hand. Leave the fingers open and it stays. Clutch it and it darts away.
txt_cn: 爱情就如手中的水银。张开手指，它就留在手中；一旦攥紧，它就飞快离开。
author: Dorothy Parker

txt_en: Pure love and suspicion cannot dwell together: at the door where the latter enters, the former makes its exit.
txt_cn: 纯洁的爱情和猜疑水火不容：起了疑心，就会丢了爱情。
author: Alexandre Dumas

txt_en: Love keeps the cold out better than a cloak.
txt_cn: 相比斗篷，爱情更能驱走寒冷。
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

txt_en: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
txt_cn: 你想知道自己是什么样的人？不要去追问，行动起来！行动会描绘和定义你的模样。
author: Thomas Jefferson

txt_en: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
txt_cn: 耐心、坚持和汗水是取得成功的无敌组合。
author: Napoleon Hill

txt_en: May the odds be ever in your favor.
txt_cn: 愿好运永远眷顾你。
author: 《饥饿游戏》

txt_en: The ones who love us never really leave us; you can always find them in here.
txt_cn: 爱我们的人永远不会真正离开，他们会一直存在你的心里。
author: 《哈利·波特与阿兹卡班的囚徒》

txt_en: It's you, on your own, picking up the pieces and starting over.
txt_cn: 凭借你自己的力量，捡起碎片，从头再来。
author: 《他其实没那么喜欢你》

txt_en: To be what we are, and to become what we are capable of becoming, is the only end of life.
txt_cn: 做我们自己，并成为我们所能成为的人，是人生唯一的目的。
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

txt_en: The greatest pleasure I know is to do a good action by stealth, and to have it found out by accident.
txt_cn: 我所知的最大乐趣是，暗中行善举，但又偶然间为人所知。
author: Charles Lamb

txt_en: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more.
txt_cn: 最好的爱，唤醒我们的灵魂，让我们更有追求。
author: Nicholas Sparks

txt_en: We are made to persist. That's how we find out who we are.
txt_cn: 我们生来就是为了坚持，这样我们才能弄清自己是谁。
author: Tobias Wolff

txt_en: If you don't have anything, you have to act like you own everything.
txt_cn: 如果你一无所有，那就要当做无所不有。
author: 《阿拉丁》

txt_en: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
txt_cn: 只要你勇敢地说再见，生活便会奖励你新的开始。
author: Paulo Coelho

txt_en: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
txt_cn: 他人的幸福即是自己幸福的根本，这就是爱。
author: Robert A. Heinlein

txt_en: Your past is not your potential. In any hour you can choose to liberate the future.
txt_cn: 你的潜力不在于过去，你随时都可以去解放未来。
author: Marilyn Ferguson

txt_en: It is difficulties that show what men are.
txt_cn: 困难面前方显人品质。
author: Epictetus

txt_en: Happy is the man who can make a living by his hobby!
txt_cn: 以爱好谋生的人是幸福的！
author: George Bernard Shaw

txt_en: It is not enough to be industrious; so are the ants. What are you industrious about?
txt_cn: 光勤劳可不够，蚂蚁也勤劳；要看你为什么而勤劳。
author: Henry David Thoreau

txt_en: The key to immortality is first living a life worth remembering.
txt_cn: 若想永垂不朽，关键在于要先过一种值得铭记的人生。
author: Bruce Lee

txt_en: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
txt_cn: 悲观者埋怨刮风，乐观者静候风变，务实者调整风帆。
author: William Arthur Ward

txt_en: The wisest mind has something yet to learn.
txt_cn: 即便是最有智慧的人，也还有要学习的地方。
author: George Santayana
